ai.question: Which two pieces of information can be determined from opening the Cisco SDM homepage of a router? (Choose two.)

choice.text: features supported by the Cisco IOS software

ai.question: A technician has been asked to perform a Cisco SDM one-step lockdown test. Which location should be used to initiate the test?

choice.text: diagnostic mode on the Firewall page
configure mode on the Security Audit page
test mode on the Security Audit page
test mode on the Firewall page

ai.question: What is a major advantage of HIPS over HIDS?

choice.text: HIPS does not require host-based client software.
HIPS prevents the need to update signature files as often.

ai.question: What is the core or “hub” component of the Security Wheel?
As part of a network security plan, where does Cisco recommend that administrators send events captured by syslog?
Which protocol should be used when strong privacy and session integrity are needed for remote router administration?

use the auto secure command to configure router securityenable the HTTP and HTTPS servers on the routercreate a user account defined with privilege level 15create a user account defined with privilege level 0create an ACL to allow HTTP traffic into the router and apply it to the vtysconfigure SSH and Telnet for local login and privilege level 15configure SSH and Telnet for local login and privilege level 0 Steps required to configure SDM 123 Drag the three items required to configure SDM from the left to the steps on the right. Not all options are used.123no titleno description given2361*enable the HTTP and HTTPS servers on your router; *create a user account defined with privilege level 15; *configure SSH and Telnet for local login and privilege level 15
